name: RockX
description: RockX, Asia's leading staking and RPC provider, manages $2B+ in assets across 30 blockchains. Trusted by 10,000+ clients, RockX offers secure non-custodial staking, Ethereum & Bitcoin restaking, and liquid restaking via Bedrock. With 24/7 monitoring, slashing protection, and high yields, RockX ensures efficient blockchain participation and rewards for institutions and individuals globally.
